abstract: For less than the price of a plane ticket to China, Export Now promised to ship a small business’s goods to China and put them online in a massive market. Most small businesses were not interested.
snippet: For less than the price of a plane ticket to China, Export Now promised to ship a small business’s goods to China and put them online in a massive market. Most small businesses were not interested.
lead_paragraph: We’ve just published a conversation with Frank Lavin, who introduced an e-commerce platform two years ago, Export Now, that was conceived as an easy, low-cost way for American small businesses to sell their goods in China. The basic pitch: “Sell into China without leaving your desk.”

headline.main: Have You Tried Selling Products in China?
